scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:check: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const buildPath=path.join(__dirname,'frontend/build'); console.log('Build path:', buildPath); console.log('Build exists:', fs.existsSync(buildPath));"
